entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 03:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
